channel.title: Getting started on Help Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Getting started on Help Documentation

item.title: Manage your account
item.description: Sign Up Go to AgroFIMS. Enter your email, password, name, last name, organization and country. Click Create. Your account has been created. You can Log in and start using AgroFIMS. An email will be sent to your mailbox to confirm your account. Don’t forget to check your spam folder if you don’t see the email in your inbox! Checking your Hugo installation Run the following command in your terminal to check if Hugo is installed.

item.title: Usage
item.description: With the site created and the theme installed, it’s time to run the server and create content. Starting & building the site Development server To start the site for development mode, execute the following command while in your /docs folder: Copy hugo server This will start a server on your localhost that will live-update with any changes you make to your site. For more Hugo commands visit https://gohugo.
